name: Super Tilt Bro. for NES
description:
Super Tilt Bro is a demake of the Super Smash Bros. series compatible with the good old Nintendo Entertainment System from the 1980s.

You and a friend take control of a clone of Sinbad, the badass mascot of Ogre3D. Two fellows, one platform: you will have to fight to throw the other out.

Controls Jump | Move left | Unused Unused | +--+ | | +----|---|------------|--------|------------------------+ | | | | | | | | +-|-+ | | | | | | o | | | | | +-|-+ +---+ | | | | | o o | o o --- --- | | +---+ +-|-+ (select) (start) ( B ) ( A ) | | | o | | -o- -o- | | +-|-+ | | | | +--------|---|---------------------------|-------|------+ | +---+ | +---+ Shield | Special moves | | | Move right Attacks

You can use different moves by holding a direction when pressing the attack or special move button.

Beta 6 released!

Changelog:

  • New stage: The hunt
    • An orb periodically appears on the stage
    • Be the first to break it, obtain an incredible strength!
  • Improved menu graphics
    • Completely revamped configuration screen
    • Added borders to elements of all menus
    • Parallax-scrolling between title and credits
    • Added margin between credits and screen's border

Previous release:

Beta 5:

  • Improved menus
    • The title screen is now animated
    • New scrolling transition between menus (with parallax!!)
    • When starting a match, the menu fades out
    • There is now some grass shown on the character selection screen
  • Improved in-game
    • Improved running animation
      • Sinbad now rubs its scimitar on the ground
    • Added a spawn animation
      • Sinbad no more comes from nowhere... He comes from a portal!
    • Increased slowdown at the end of the match
      • Allowing for more taunts from the winner
